title: Porsche AG
description: Porsche AG is renowned for its luxury sports cars, and its brand colors reflect its high-performance and elegance. The color palette includes a striking red (#B12B28), symbolizing passion and speed; a sophisticated gold (#EBD698), denoting luxury and excellence; and a classic black (#000000), representing prestige and timelessness. These carefully chosen colors are sourced from the official Porsche brand guidelines.
